Key Match Events: Chisholm successfully steals second base and scores on Verdugo's line drive to left field, giving the Yankees the lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Chisholm's exploits on the basepaths showcased his ability to impact games with his legs and confidence under pressure.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Second-base umpire Lance Barrett's call stood despite a close play, keeping the scoring threat alive.
Luke Weaver struck out Witt Jr. on a fastball Witt thought was too low, recording the final four outs of the game.
